item.title: Trump pardons convicted Binance founder Changpeng Zhao
item.description: Binance CEO Changpeng "CZ" Zhao has been pardoned by President Donald Trump, a source familiar with the matter confirmed to FOX Business.

item.title: Molson Coors to cut hundreds of jobs in restructuring plan
item.description: Molson Coors will eliminate 400 positions representing 9% of its Americas salaried workforce as part of a transformation strategy to accelerate growth...

item.title: Nevada player turns $3 bet into $1M jackpot on 'Wheel of Fortune' progressive slot machine
item.description: Nevada player turns $3 bet into $1,048,675 jackpot on "Wheel of Fortune" slot at Sunset Station casino. Local Las Vegas resident hits life-changing pr...

item.title: Beyond Meat, Walmart and a MEME ETF
item.description: Walmart and Roundhill Investments MEME ETF created big headlines for Beyond Meat, spiking the stock, which had been left for dead after hitting a reco...

item.title: Merck breaks ground on $3B manufacturing plant in Virginia
item.description: Merck is breaking ground on a new 400,000-square-foot manufacturing facility in Elkton, Virginia, as part of its $70 billion U.S. investment strategy.
